# Notice of Proposed Procurement - Communications Consultant, Senior (1)

## Reference Information
* Reference Number: cb-5811-62065497
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: 23-220055
* Publication Date: 2023-05-24
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-08T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-06-08
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-08-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-07-31
* Tender Status: Expired

## Business Requirements
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is soliciting proposals for a Communications Consultant to support the Office of the Ombudsman (CORE) in fulfilling its mandate. The Contractor will be responsible for producing and publishing a range of reports, including an Annual Report to Parliament, quarterly reports on complaints, and country visit reports. Additional creative products may be required, such as video development and production.

The Contractor will manage the production process from concept to coordination and execution of final products, adhering to CORE's brand standards and the Federal Identity Program. The Contractor will work with the Global Affairs Canada's web development team to deliver high-quality, professional communications products in both print and digital formats, while managing competing deadlines.

## Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated on the basis of the combined ratings of technical merit and price. The technical merit will include the Contractor's experience, qualifications, and past performance in providing communications services.

## Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

## Contact Information
* Name: Tracy Langille
* Email: tracy.langille@international.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 791-7144
* Address: 200 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1
